title: Does this already exist?
content:
Please if you can find something like this send link.

Thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320042624im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Light%20bulb_5766.PNG)
author: logistics

comments.content:
Looks nice but light bulbs are used in thousands of logos. I have 2 clients with light bulb logos. So it's hard to come up with anything unique.

A quick Google for "Light Bulb Logo" produces some that are similar, but I didn't see an exact match. But it's probably out there somewhere.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320042624im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bulb_6080.jpg)

Yes, this exists many times over. I've done something similar for an older project -

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320042624im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lightbulb_6256.jpg)

Yes, there are thousands of light bulb logos, but I think your symbol has enough potential to outshine – no pun intended – most of them. The brush stroke feels natural and pulls it away from [other competitors](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320042624/https:/www.google.no/search?q=lightbulb+logo&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ei=-KjwVNHkDcGEPNSJgNAO&ved=0CAcQ_AUoAQ&biw=1408&bih=762). If anything, have another look at the weight distribution in the bulb.

Sometimes an excellent execution is all it takes.
